alerts.name: Critical System Failure
alerts.solution: Restart the affected system and investigate the root cause.

alerts.name: DNS Resolution Failure
alerts.solution: Investigate DNS configurations, update DNS records, and ensure proper resolution to prevent service disruptions.

alerts.name: Network Outage
alerts.solution: Check network configurations, routers, and switches. Restore connectivity as soon as possible.

alerts.name: Security Breach
alerts.solution: Isolate affected systems, investigate the breach, and apply necessary security patches. Reset passwords if necessary.

alerts.name: Application Downtime
alerts.solution: Identify the cause of the downtime, fix the issue, and perform thorough testing before restoring the application.

alerts.name: Disk Space Exceeded
alerts.solution: Free up disk space by removing unnecessary files, archives, or logs. Consider resizing partitions if needed.

alerts.name: Database Connection Failure
alerts.solution: Check database server status, credentials, and network connectivity. Re-establish the database connection.

alerts.name: Server Overload
alerts.solution: Identify the source of the overload, optimize resource usage, and consider scaling resources if necessary.

alerts.name: Critical Software Bug
alerts.solution: Identify and fix the bug. Deploy the updated software version and ensure thorough testing.

alerts.name: Hardware Failure
alerts.solution: Replace or repair the faulty hardware component. Ensure proper backups to prevent data loss.

alerts.name: Power Outage
alerts.solution: Check power sources, generators, and UPS systems. Restore power and ensure proper system shutdown and recovery.

alerts.name: Authentication Failure
alerts.solution: Investigate user credentials, LDAP, or identity provider issues. Reset passwords if needed and ensure secure authentication mechanisms.

alerts.name: Data Corruption
alerts.solution: Identify corrupted data sources, restore from backups, and implement measures to prevent future corruption.

alerts.name: Service Unavailability
alerts.solution: Check service dependencies, restart services, and monitor for any cascading failures. Investigate and resolve the root cause.

alerts.name: Network Latency
alerts.solution: Analyze network performance, optimize configurations, and consider upgrading network infrastructure to reduce latency.

alerts.name: System Resource Exhaustion
alerts.solution: Identify the resource(s) causing exhaustion (CPU, memory, etc.), optimize usage, and consider resource scaling.

alerts.name: Backup Failure
alerts.solution: Investigate backup configurations, storage availability, and retry the backup process. Ensure regular testing of backup and restore procedures.

alerts.name: Unauthorized Access
alerts.solution: Immediately isolate affected systems, revoke unauthorized access, and strengthen security measures. Conduct a thorough security audit.

alerts.name: Software License Expiry
alerts.solution: Renew software licenses, update license keys, and ensure compliance with licensing agreements.

alerts.name: SSL Certificate Expiry
alerts.solution: Renew SSL certificates, update configurations, and monitor certificate expiration dates to prevent service disruptions.

alerts.name: Database Indexing Issue
alerts.solution: Analyze database indexing, optimize queries, and rebuild indexes if necessary to improve performance.

alerts.name: Memory Leak
alerts.solution: Identify the application causing the memory leak, fix the code issue, and restart the affected application or server.

alerts.name: API Rate Limit Exceeded
alerts.solution: Review API usage, increase rate limits if needed, and optimize API requests to stay within specified limits.

alerts.name: Software Configuration Error
alerts.solution: Review software configurations, correct errors, and ensure consistency across environments.

alerts.name: User Data Loss
alerts.solution: Identify the cause of data loss, restore user data from backups, and implement measures to prevent future incidents.

alerts.name: DNS Resolution Failure
alerts.solution: Investigate DNS configurations, update DNS records, and ensure proper resolution to prevent service disruptions.

alerts.name: DNS Resolution Failure
alerts.solution: Investigate DNS configurations, update DNS records, and ensure proper resolution to prevent service disruptions.
